dcterms:description: A dataset developed using data from Reddit, specifically from the r/SuicideWatch subreddit. It includes post id, anonymous user id, timestamp, subreddit name, post title, and post body. The training data contains four labels indicating increasing risk of suicidality, with a control group of users with no known suicidality risk.
dcterms:title: University of Maryland Reddit Suicidality Dataset
